Class: Rule

Rule

new Rule(validator, settings)

Represents a rule.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
validator function Field validator.
settings Object Rule configuration.
Source:
  • Rule.js, line 10

Methods

evaluate(data, next)

Evaluates a rule by evaluating its validator against passed in field data, configured using the stored settings. If the evaluate method succeeds, it will pass through to the next rule via the "next" callback. If the evaluate method fails, it will pass an error message as the first parameter into "next".
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object Field data to evaluate.
next function Next validator to evaluate.
Source:
  • Rule.js, line 26
